metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9392 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
The calcstepsizes function in jpc_dec.c in JasPer before 1.900.17 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure) via acrafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5').
